help.name: Help
help.description: When you mention this bot in a reply to a message, it generates an image from that message.
help.separate: If you specify more than one, separate them with `,`
help.not_related: _* This Bot is not related to @MakeItAQuote on Twitter._

error.message_not_found: I could not find the message you are referring to.
error.banned: You or this server is banned from using this bot.
error.blocked: Target user has blocked image generation. (or you've blocked image generation)
error.remove_not_allowed: You are not allowed to remove the message.

bot_permissions.guild: I do not have the required permissions in this server.
bot_permissions.channel: I do not have the required permissions to run commands in this channel.

error.not_bot_admin: You are not a this bot's admin.

options.light: Makes the background of the image white
options.font: Change the font to the specified one. [learn more]({{url}})
